question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. fire hydrant
B. white advertisement board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The fire hydrant is on the sidewalk in the foreground, while the white advertisement board is on a building in the background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
